item.description:
Member Ethan Davis will be presenting on human-powered vehicles at the Southern Maine Community College seminar series on Sustainable Vehicle Design.

Ethan travels by velomobile, which he describes as an "enclosed and/or recumbent bicycle and trycycle, often with electric assist. The most efficient and healthy transportation on the planet." He also sells velomobiles in Arundel, and has a webpage here.

The SMCC seminar series on Sustainable Vehicle Design is a series of discussions with the owners and builders of a wide range of alternative vehicles, covering technical aspects, design philosophy, performance data, legal issues, cost, efficiency, historical and current trends, and personal anecdotes.

FMI on the SMCC series, contact John Braugitam (207-741-5958, jbrautigam at smccme.edu) or Ruth Morrison (207-741-5856, rmorrison at smccme.edu) at SMCC.
item.name: Human-Powered Vehicle Seminar
